Title: Samsara
Writer: Pan Nalin (story), Pan Nalin (screenplay), Tim Baker (screenplay)
Actors: Shawn Ku, Christy Chung, Neelesha Barthel, Lhakpa Tsering
Plot: A spiritual love-story set in the majestic landscape of Ladakh, Himalayas. Samsara is a quest; one man's struggle to find spiritual Enlightenment by renouncing the world. And one woman's ...
